name: Apple
description: A sweet, crunchy fruit with a red or green skin.

name: Banana
description: A long, curved fruit with a yellow skin and creamy flesh.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit with a bright orange skin and juicy segments.

name: Grapes
description: Small, round fruits usually found in clusters. They can be green, red, or purple.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, juicy, red fruit with tiny seeds on its surface.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a prickly exterior and sweet, juicy interior.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a green rind and red or pink flesh.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet, juicy flesh and a thin skin.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round berries that are dark blue in color and sweet in flavor.
